mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM PPM_DELIVERABLE A INNER JOIN ($DELIVERTABLENAME$) B ON A.INSTANCEGUID = B.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_DELIVERABLEITEM D ON A.DELIVERABLEITEMGUID = D.GUID INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ X INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE Y ON X.GUID = Y.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID# AND X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID#) C ON D.PROJECTGUID = C.GUID WHERE 1=1

SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM PPM_DELIVERABLE A INNER JOIN ($DELIVERTABLENAME$) B ON A.INSTANCEGUID = B.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_DELIVERABLEITEM D ON A.DELIVERABLEITEMGUID = D.GUID INNER JOIN (SELECT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ X WHERE X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID#) C ON D.PROJECTGUID = C.GUID WHERE 1=1

SELECT C.MD_ID PRJID, C.MD_NAME PRJNAME, B.MD_ID, B.GUID, B.MD_NAME, B.STATUS,
B.CLASSGUID, B.CLASSIFICATION CLASSIFICATIONGUID, B.CREATEUSER CREATEUSERGUID,
A.CREATETIME SUBMITTEDTIME, B.CREATETIME CREATIONTIME FROM PPM_DELIVERABLE A INNER JOIN ($DELIVERTABLENAME$) B ON A.INSTANCEGUID = B.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_DELIVERABLEITEM D ON A.DELIVERABLEITEMGUID = D.GUID INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ X INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE Y ON X.GUID = Y.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID# AND X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID#) C ON D.PROJECTGUID = C.GUID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY $SORTFIELD$
ORDER BY B.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT C.MD_ID PRJID, C.MD_NAME PRJNAME, B.MD_ID, B.GUID, B.MD_NAME, B.STATUS,
B.CLASSGUID, B.CLASSIFICATION CLASSIFICATIONGUID, B.CREATEUSER CREATEUSERGUID,
A.CREATETIME as SUBMITTEDTIME, B.CREATETIME as CREATIONTIME FROM PPM_DELIVERABLE A INNER JOIN ($DELIVERTABLENAME$) B ON A.INSTANCEGUID = B.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_DELIVERABLEITEM D ON A.DELIVERABLEITEMGUID = D.GUID INNER JOIN (SELECT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP FROM $PROJECTTABLENAME$ X WHERE X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID#) C ON D.PROJECTGUID = C.GUID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY $SORTFIELD$
ORDER BY B.CREATETIME DESC

and PROJECTGUID = #PRJNAME#
